HERO.TITLE: Quality. Reliability. Global Reach.
HERO.SUBTITLE: Your trusted partner in food and beverage distribution, import/export, and retail solutions across the globe.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Leading the way in food and beverage distribution across the globe
ABOUT.WHO_WE_ARE_TEXT: TPB Export is a premier food and beverage distribution company with over 15 years of experience in import/export and retail operations. We connect quality products with markets worldwide, ensuring reliable supply chain solutions for our partners.
ABOUT.MISSION_TEXT: To be the trusted bridge between quality food and beverage producers and markets worldwide, delivering excellence in distribution, import/export, and retail services.
ABOUT.VISION_TEXT: To become the leading distribution partner in the food and beverage industry, recognized for our reliability, innovation, and commitment to customer satisfaction.
ABOUT.INTEGRITY_TEXT: We conduct our business with the highest ethical standards and transparency.
ABOUT.EXCELLENCE_TEXT: We strive for excellence in every product we distribute and every service we provide.
ABOUT.PARTNERSHIP_TEXT: We build lasting relationships with our partners, suppliers, and customers.
ABOUT.INNOVATION_TEXT: We continuously improve our processes and adapt to market changes.

DISTRIBUTION.TITLE: Distribution Services
DISTRIBUTION.SUBTITLE: Reliable logistics and supply chain solutions for your business
DISTRIBUTION.HEADING: Comprehensive Distribution Network
DISTRIBUTION.TEXT: Our distribution services cover the entire supply chain, from warehousing to last-mile delivery. With strategically located facilities and a fleet of modern vehicles, we ensure your products reach their destination safely and on time.
DISTRIBUTION.NATIONWIDE_TEXT: Comprehensive logistics network ensuring timely delivery across all regions.
DISTRIBUTION.WAREHOUSING_TEXT: State-of-the-art storage facilities with temperature-controlled environments.
DISTRIBUTION.INVENTORY_TEXT: Advanced tracking systems for real-time inventory visibility.
DISTRIBUTION.SUPPLY_CHAIN_TEXT: End-to-end supply chain management tailored to your needs.

IMPORT_EXPORT.TITLE: Import & Export
IMPORT_EXPORT.SUBTITLE: Your gateway to global markets
IMPORT_EXPORT.HEADING: International Trade Expertise
IMPORT_EXPORT.TEXT: With established partnerships across 20+ countries, we facilitate seamless import and export operations for food and beverage products. Our team handles everything from sourcing to delivery, ensuring compliance with international trade regulations.
IMPORT_EXPORT.GLOBAL_SOURCING_TEXT: Access to quality products from trusted suppliers worldwide.
IMPORT_EXPORT.DOCUMENTATION_TEXT: Complete handling of import/export documentation and compliance.
IMPORT_EXPORT.CUSTOMS_TEXT: Expert navigation of customs procedures and regulations.
IMPORT_EXPORT.QUALITY_TEXT: Rigorous quality control at every step of the process.

RETAIL.TITLE: Retail Solutions
RETAIL.SUBTITLE: Empowering retailers with premium products and support
RETAIL.HEADING: Partner with Us for Retail Success
RETAIL.TEXT: We support retail partners with a comprehensive range of food and beverage products, competitive pricing, and dedicated support services. Our retail solutions are designed to help your business thrive in a competitive market.
RETAIL.PRODUCT_RANGE_TEXT: Curated selection of premium food and beverage products for retail.
RETAIL.PRICING_TEXT: Wholesale pricing that helps you maintain healthy margins.
RETAIL.SUPPORT_TEXT: Marketing materials and merchandising support for partners.
RETAIL.REPLENISHMENT_TEXT: Fast restocking to keep your shelves always full.

CAREER.TITLE: Join Our Team
CAREER.SUBTITLE: Build your career with a growing company
CAREER.WHY_WORK_TEXT: At TPB Export, we believe our people are our greatest asset. We offer a dynamic work environment where talent is recognized and growth is encouraged. Join us and be part of a team that's shaping the future of food and beverage distribution.
CAREER.CAREER_GROWTH_TEXT: Opportunities for professional development and advancement.
CAREER.HEALTH_TEXT: Comprehensive health insurance for you and your family.
CAREER.GENERAL_APP: Don't see a position that fits? Send us your resume anyway!

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: Get in touch with our team
CONTACT.NAME: Full Name
CONTACT.SUBJECT: Subject
CONTACT.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. We will get back to you soon.
CONTACT.ERROR_MESSAGE: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again or contact us directly.

FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Your trusted partner in food and beverage distribution, import/export, and retail solutions.
FOOTER.NEWSLETTER_TEXT: Subscribe to our newsletter for the latest news and updates.
